attributes.action: Ensure that MP,s behave in an orderly fashion while debating in the Houses of Parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How many people within the British Isles think that the MP,s behave in a childish manner while debating and voting on issues that affect us all ?
My 12 year old son asked me if they were drunk while watching a debate on TV recently.
Are the MP,s we vote into a position of authority realy a good role model ?
Is it any wonder the youth of today is in the state it is when MP,s cant even behave themselves while on view to all and sundry.
These people make decisions for us all albeit in the manner of something akin to drunken arguments after a few too many drinks.
Mr Blair I urge you to please keep your house in order for all our sakes.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
